text: Luiz Henrique da Silveira (February 25, 1940 â€“ May 10, 2015) was a Brazilian politician and lawyer. He represented Santa Catarina in the Federal Senate since 2011. He was governor of Santa Catarina from 2003 to 2006 and 2007 to 2010. He was a member of the Brazilian Democratic Movement . da Silveira died in Joinville, Santa Catarina from a heart attack, aged 75. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Brazilian Democratic Movement politicians Category:Brazilian lawyers Category:Politicians from Santa Catarina
title: Luiz Henrique da Silveira
